title: Create an account
des: You need to create an account. You can do this by clicking on the Sign up button above.

title: Choose a theme
des: Vertical, short or long. We give you the control to make your video resume. We’ve more than 150+ themes.

title: Edit on the Web
des: Add your video clip(s), texts, decoration and effects. All these can be done on the web.

title: Ready to Fly
des: You’re all set to get hired with flying colors now.
